vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) end, extremity
1a) end, mouth, extremity
1b) border, outskirts
1c) the whole (condensed term for what is included within extremities)
1d) at the end of (a certain time)
Also means: qe.tseh (קֵ֫צֶה "end" H7097B)
§ 1) end, extremity
1a) end, mouth, extremity
1b) border, outskirts
1c) the whole (condensed term for what is included within extremities)
1d) at the end of (a certain time)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 末端, 盡頭
1a) 末端, 河口, 盡頭
1b) 邊緣, 邊界
1c) 全部, (簡化用語, 指在邊界內所有的)
1d) 結尾 (某段時間)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 末端, 尽头
1a) 末端, 河口, 尽头
1b) 边缘, 边界
1c) 全部, (简化用语, 指在边界内所有的)
1d) 结尾 (某段时间)
